sentences.sentence: Her voice was shrill and penetrating.
More distinct came the shrill voice of Tinker Bell.
sentences.translation: 更清晰的是小叮当尖锐的声音。

sentences.sentence: Imagine her surprise, when the White Rabbit read out, at the top of his shrill little voice, the name "Alice!"
sentences.translation: 使她大吃一惊的是，此时兔子用刺耳的嗓音尖叫道：“爱丽丝！”
